headline: GTA Online
subtitle: LSCM Membership Rewards
content:
Anyone who visits the LS Car Meet will be gifted the LS Customs Varsity Jacket. Car Meet Members will also receive the Fukaru Race Livery for the upcoming Vapid Dominator ASP for logging in.

Completing the Daily Vehicle List on the Chalkboard by your Auto Shop office will land you the Street Crimes Color Gangs Tee. And speaking of bonuses: help KDJ and Sessanta complete any Contract Finale before August 5 to receive an additional lump sum of GTA$200K, as well as the White Born x Raised Tee.
